title: The Temper Trap - Conditions [2009] [320kbps] [1337x]
description:
THE TEMPER TRAP - CONDITIONS, album released June 19th, 2009.
Encoded 320kbps [Lame] mp3.

The Temper Trap is a rock band from Melbourne, Australia. They are noted for
their atmospheric sound, featuring grand guitars set to pulsating rhythms. The
Temper Trap first attracted the attention of the worldwide music industry after
playing to sell-out crowds at the Musexpo in London in October 2008, and then
at South by Southwest in March 2009.

Conditions is the debut album by The Temper Trap. The debut album is
unquestionably set to deliver upon the immense promise created by acclaimed
singles Science Of Fear and Sweet Disposition. It is a collection of songs
equally ambitious as bold and crucially in the modern era, each song demands
shared billing. From the soaring Down River, resplendent with strings,
horns & choirs to the spine-tingling Solder On, the tribal percussive beat of
live favourite Drum Song and transcendent Love Lost, which somehow wields the
common ground between neo-soul and wide-screen alternative rock.

Tracks
01 Love Lost
02 Rest
03 Sweet Disposition
04 Down River
05 Soldier On
06 Fader
07 Fools
08 Resurrection
09 Science Of Fear
10 Drum Song
